mapper.insert: insert into tb_sale(sale_category, sale_title, user_id, sale_price, sale_img, sale_content) values (#{sale_category}, #{sale_title}, #{user_id}, #{sale_price}, #{sale_img}, #{sale_content})
mapper.select: select b.sale_idx, b.sale_title, b.user_id, b.sale_price, TO_CHAR(b.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS created_at, b.sale_img, b.sale_views, a.user_nick from tb_user a inner join tb_sale b on(a.user_id = b.user_id) order by b.sale_idx desc

select b.sale_title, b.sale_price, a.user_id, TO_CHAR(b.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS created_at, b.sale_content, b.sale_img, a.user_nick from tb_user a inner join tb_sale b on(a.user_id = b.user_id) where b.sale_idx=#{sale_idx}
mapper.update: update tb_sale set sale_views = sale_views + 1 where sale_idx = #{sale_idx}
mapper.select: select b.sale_idx, b.sale_title, b.user_id, b.sale_price, TO_CHAR(b.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS created_at, b.sale_img, b.sale_views, a.user_nick from tb_user a inner join tb_sale b on (a.user_id = b.user_id) where b.sale_category = '식물' order by b.sale_idx desc

select b.sale_idx, b.sale_title, b.user_id, b.sale_price, TO_CHAR(b.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS created_at, b.sale_img, b.sale_views, a.user_nick from tb_user a inner join tb_sale b on a.user_id = b.user_id where b.sale_category = '용품' order by b.sale_idx desc
